repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Records include stockholders' ledger, 1941-1959; annual financial statements, 1950-1954; articles of incorporation, as amended by typescript, 1945, 1949, 1951, 1953 (gift of W.G. Northrup, Portsmouth, NH, June 1963); minutes, 1953-1958, of directors' & stockholders' meetings; and correspondence.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: North Star Woolen Mills was founded in 1864 amd had locations in Minneapolis, MN, Lima, OH, and Sanford, ME. Minneapolis operation closed in 1950 and business centered in Lima. In 1956, moved from Lima to Sanford and in 1959, it merged with Maine Spinning Company.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records include stockholders' ledger, 1941-1959; annual financial statements, 1950-1954; articles of incorporation, as amended by typescript, 1945, 1949, 1951, 1953 (gift of W.G. Northrup, Portsmouth, NH, June 1963); minutes, 1953-1958, of directors' & stockholders' meetings; and correspondence.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: American Textile History Museum Collection, gift of Ames Stevens.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: North Star Woolen Mill Records #6812. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The ATHM # references the accession number given to collections by the American Textile History Museum (ATHM). These numbers have been kept and tracked for researchers looking for former citations. For images, these numbers will also be the digital object identifier if the item was scanned by the ATHM. For this collection, the ATHM accession number was 0022.146. When these numbers appear in the processing note, the box and folder are the numbers that immediately follow the accession number. The number 0022.146.1.3, would indicate that the material was formerly in Box 1, Folder 3.

did.unittitle: Directors and Stockholders Meetings - Minutes & Correspondence
